titleInfo.title: USA v. CORDERO et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER AS TO JUAN CORDERO, RICHARD CARABALLO-RODRIGUEZ THAT 112 MOTION FOR JUDGMENT OF ACQUITTAL FILED BY JUAN CORDERO IS DENIED. SENTENCING WILL BE SET BY SEPERATE ORDER. 97 MOTION FOR JUDGMENT OF ACQUITTAL FILED BY RICHARD CARABALLO-RODRIGUEZ IS GRANTED. THE CLERK WILL ENTER A JUDGMENT OF ACQUITTAL FOR CARABALLO-RODRIGUEZ WITH RESPECT TO ALL COUNTS OF THE INDICTMENT IN THIS ACTION. Signed by HONORABLE CYNTHIA M. titleInfo.title: USA v. CORDERO et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT OF ACQUITTAL/NOT GUILTY AS TO RICHARD CARABALLO-RODRIGUEZ (2), Count(s) 1, 2, THE COURT HAVING GRANTED DEFT'S. MOTION FOR JUDGMENT OF ACQUITTAL AS TO: COUNTS 1 AND 2. IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED THAT JUDGMENT IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ABOVE FINDINGS IS HEREBY ENTERED PURSUANT TO RULE 32(b), FED.R.CRIM.P. Signed by HONORABLE CYNTHIA M.
